name: Oauth2 authentication for Moodle
tagline: Google, Facebook, Linkedin, Github and  Windows Live
body:
This plugin adds the "Sign-in with Google / Facebook / Github / Linkedin / Windows Live" buttons on the login page. The first time the user login with a social account, a new Moodle account is created. 

### Installation:

1. add the plugin into /auth/googleoauth2/
2. in the Moodle administration, enable the plugin (Admin block > Plugins > Authentication)
3. in the plugin settings, follow the displayed instructions.

### You need personal support
You can contact me at jerome@mouneyrac.com.

### Thanks to
* Moodle HQ: during 4 days of a Moodle HQ personal project week, I created a [Travis script for Moodle plugins](https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=215998#p1033241) and fixed many issues on this plugin. 
* the many [contributors](https://github.com/mouneyrac/moodle-auth_googleoauth2/graphs/contributors).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
